title: James similar IQ scores shows test is

content.prompt: James takes an IQ test when he is in third grade and receives a score of 112. When he is tested again in sixth grade with an alternate version of the same test, his score is 114. The fact that the two scores are very similar most directly indicates that the IQ test is

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
